mapper.sql: select a.id, a.uid, a.gid, a.mode, a.acl, a.label, a.description, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.t0, a.t1, a."year", a.proc, a.since, a.deadline, a.qty_plan, a.qty_actual, a.qty_valid, a.ou, ou.id ou_id, ou.uid ou_uid, ou.gid ou_gid, ou.mode ou_mode, ou.acl ou_acl, ou.label ou_label, ou.description ou_description, ou.priority ou_priority, ou.flags ou_flags, ou."state" ou_state, ou.creation ou_creation, ou.lastmod ou_lastmod, ou."version" ou_version, ou.alias ou_alias, ou.ctprops ou_ctprops, ou.address1 ou_address1, ou.address2 ou_address2, ou."zone" ou_zone, ou.tel ou_tel, ou.telok ou_telok, ou.email ou_email, ou.emailok ou_emailok, ou.props ou_props, ou.org ou_org, ou.parent ou_parent, ou."depth" ou_depth, ownerGroup.id ownerGroup_id, ownerGroup."name" ownerGroup_name, ownerGroup."type" ownerGroup_type, ownerGroup.label ownerGroup_label, ownerGroup.description ownerGroup_description, ownerGroup.priority ownerGroup_priority, ownerGroup.flags ownerGroup_flags, ownerGroup."state" ownerGroup_state, ownerGroup.creation ownerGroup_creation, ownerGroup.lastmod ownerGroup_lastmod, ownerGroup."version" ownerGroup_version, ownerGroup.props ownerGroup_props, ownerGroup.parent ownerGroup_parent, ownerUser.id ownerUser_id, ownerUser."type" ownerUser_type, ownerUser."name" ownerUser_name, ownerUser.label ownerUser_label, ownerUser.description ownerUser_description, ownerUser.priority ownerUser_priority, ownerUser.flags ownerUser_flags, ownerUser."state" ownerUser_state, ownerUser.creation ownerUser_creation, ownerUser.lastmod ownerUser_lastmod, ownerUser."version" ownerUser_version, ownerUser.props ownerUser_props, ownerUser.gid0 ownerUser_gid0, ownerUser.referer ownerUser_referer, proc.id proc_id, proc.uid proc_uid, proc.gid proc_gid, proc.mode proc_mode, proc.acl proc_acl, proc.label proc_label, proc.description proc_description, proc.priority proc_priority, proc.flags proc_flags, proc."state" proc_state, proc.creation proc_creation, proc.lastmod proc_lastmod, proc."version" proc_version, proc.t0 proc_t0, proc.t1 proc_t1, proc."year" proc_year, proc.task proc_task, proc.parent proc_parent, proc."output" proc_output, proc.std proc_std, proc.qty proc_qty, proc.batch proc_batch, proc.since proc_since, proc.deadline proc_deadline, proc.ntrack proc_ntrack from fabtrack a left join lily.orgunit ou on a.ou = ou.id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join fabproc proc on a.proc = proc.id

select a.id, a.uid, a.gid, a.mode, a.acl, a.label, a.description, a.priority, a.flags, a."state", a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.t0, a.t1, a."year", a.proc, a.since, a.deadline, a.qty_plan, lily.orgunit ou on a.ou = ou.id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join fabproc proc on a.proc = proc.id
mapper.insert: insert into fabtrack( uid, gid, mode, acl, label, description, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", proc, since, deadline, qty_plan, qty_actual, qty_valid, ou ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{label}, #{description}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{procId}, #{since}, #{deadline}, #{qtyPlan}, #{qtyActual}, #{qtyValid}, #{ouId} );
